headline: Show HN: Send Messages to Your Future Self (Free on iOS)
description:
I've been working on HiFutureSelf slowly for the past 12 years.

And recently added a bunch of new features!

- Location based message trigger - Share Extension, to allow you to pop text into HiFutureSelf - Pause/Resume Repeating Messages (instead of having to delete them) - Send Future Message invites to your friends

HiFutureSelf is free and does not have tracking or ads. I hope you enjoy it!

What do you think of it? How can I make HFS better for you?

Direct link to the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/hifutureself-send-quick-messag...

headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 向未來的自己發送信息（iOS版免費）。
